post.body: Like what? Where to eat and what to see?
What about Deepak Chopra's glasses? They are red glitter frames!
LOL!!
Oh boy. It's simple. We all want what we cannot have. Plus, she prob gives him attention that he doesn't get at home.
Only that early because I have to commute into NYC, and get kids ready, etc. Let's just say we BOTH get up way too early!
Oh, poor you.
I think so. Though did you see all the chatter about NBC banning Ann Coulter?
I have to wake up at 5:15 a.m. Feel your pain.
Really? We are expecting snow tomorrow. Again.
Mine is a 2004! It cost 3K but that's cheaper than buying a new car.
Yum!
I think that is old news but I could be wrong.
I noticed that too. I'm sure there are others that qualify.
OK, Nighty Night.
Calling it a night. Must get up way too early tomorrow. And the day after that, and the day after that.
Funniest thing I've read all day: http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/europe/7811686.stm
Realized I'm the only person in my house who picks up anything from floor. hmm.
It cost a whole lot of dough to get my car fixed. Yuck.
Must pick up car from mechanic, feed kids, and finish this and that.
Most educated towns: http://tinyurl.com/8p65s8
